aboutMe.aboutTitle: Revd. Joseph Gentle Omohwo Imudje Ph.D (JP)
body: I am a Priest in the Church of Nigeria-Anglican Communion, Diocese of Warri. He is presently serving as a Vicar at St. Luke's Anglican Church, Ugbolokposo, Effurun.

I was baptized with the Holy Spirit on the 11th of September 1998. And I am an anointed charismatic, evangelistic, motivational, prophetic, inspirational and seasoned revival preacher and teacher of the Gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ.

I was called in such a time as this to proclaim the message of salvation/deliverance to the captives. My messages and ministrations in the Holy Spirit have blessed and transformed many lives and are often characterized by signs and wonders. I am blessed with a godly wife-Mrs. Uviemuamren Pauline Imudje and biological and spiritual children.

believes.title: My Believes as a Christian
believes.cross: I believe that Jesus died for us on the cross. John 5: 24. Very truly I tell you, whoever hears my word and believes him who sent me has eternal life and will not be judged but has crossed over from death to life.
believes.bell: Every time is a good time to worship God. When you are sad or happy worship The Lord. Psalm 34: 1 & 2 - I will bless the Lord at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth. My soul shall make her boast in the Lord: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad.
believes.bible: The Bible is The Word of the Lord.
believes.church: The church is the place where the Christian faith is nurtured and where the Holy Spirit is manifest on earth. It is where Christians are received into the faith and where they are brought together into one body through the Eucharist.

achievements.title: I Thank God for giving me the Grace to become a PhD holder of Crowther Graduate Theological Seminary. And I have used that as a great way to share The Word of God through my books.
I am a PhD holder of Crowther Graduate Theological Seminary
achievements.body: Crowther Graduate Theological Seminary is a learning and research center for sound and orthodox Theology for Anglicans in particular and all Christians.

achievements.title: I am the author of serval inspirational books
achievements.body: Overtime I have written serval inspirational books that will help us into living a godly live.
